body_html: I believe you are talking about TFTRT. Yes you can use TRT4 tarballs, just point configure.py to correct installation directory and update your LD_LIBRARY_PATH in your virtual env to use TRT4 libraries from the tarball.
body_text: I believe you are talking about TFTRT. Yes you can use TRT4 tarballs, just point configure.py to correct installation directory and update your LD_LIBRARY_PATH in your virtual env to use TRT4 libraries from the tarball.
body: I believe you are talking about TFTRT. Yes you can use TRT4 tarballs, just point configure.py to correct installation directory and update your LD_LIBRARY_PATH in your virtual env to use TRT4 libraries from the tarball.
